# Importing Geospatial Data

In this in-class data, 2 gesptial data ses will be used, they are:

1.  geo_export
2.  nga_abb

```{r}
#| eval: false 
wp <- st_read(dsn = "geodata",
              layer = "geo_export",
              crs = 4326) %>%
  filter(clean_coun == "Nigeria")

wp_nga <- write_rds(wp, "geodata/wp_nga.rds")
```

In the code chunk below, 'write_rds()' of readr package is used to save the extracted sf data table into an output file in rds data format.

## Data Wrangling

### Extracting the necessary data

```{r}
wp_nga <- read_rds("geospatial/wp_nga.rds") %>%
  mutate(status_cle =
           replace_na(status_cle, "Unknown"))

```

In the code chunk below, 'freq()'

```{r}
wpt_functional <- wp_nga %>%
  filter(status_cle %in%
           c())
```
